title: Here's a curated list of 20 articles up to 2021 that review various aspects of Natural Language Processing (NLP) research. These articles cover a range of topics including foundational techniques, recent advancements, and specific subfields within NLP
**"A Survey of the State of the Art in Natural Language Generation: Core tasks, applications and evaluation"**
**"A Survey on Recent Advances in Named Entity Recognition from Deep Learning models"**
**"A Survey on Text Classification: From Shallow to Deep Learning"**
**"A Survey on Sentiment Analysis: From Opinion Mining to Emotion Recognition"**

container-title: **"A Survey on Recent Advances in Neural Machine Translation"**

title: **"A Survey of the Usages of Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing"**
**"A Survey on Dialogue Systems: Recent Advances and New Frontiers"**

author.literal: **"A Survey on Knowledge Graphs: Representation, Acquisition, and Applications"** - Hogan, A., Blomqvist, E., Cochez, M., d'Amato, C., de Melo, G., Gutierrez, C., ... & Zimmermann, A.
**"A Survey on Biomedical Named Entity Recognition"** - Li, F., Jin, Y., Liu, W., Rawat, B. P. S., Cai, P., & Yu, H.
**"A Survey on Event Extraction: Datasets, Methods, and Evaluations"** - Liu, H., & Chen, Y.
**"A Survey on Text Summarization: Approaches, Datasets, Evaluation Metrics, and Challenges"** - El-Kassas, W. S., Salama, C. R., Rafea, A. A., & Mohamed, H. K.
**"A Survey on Multimodal Sentiment Analysis"** - Poria, S., Cambria, E., Bajpai, R., & Hussain, A.
**"A Survey on Deep Learning for Named Entity Recognition"** - Li, J., Sun, A., Han, J., & Li, C.

title: **"A Survey on Natural Language Processing for Fake News Detection"**

author.literal: **"A Survey on Neural Network-Based Word Representation: From Word2vec to BERT"** - Liu, Q., & Zhang, Y.
**"A Survey on Cross-Lingual Word Embedding Models"** - Ruder, S., Vulić, I., & Søgaard, A.

title: **"A Survey on Deep Learning for Information Retrieval"**
**"A Survey on Natural Language Processing for Social Media Analysis"**
**"A Survey on Neural Text Generation: Past, Present, and Beyond"**

author.literal: **"A Survey on Natural Language Processing for Code Generation"** - Allamanis, M., Barr, E. T., Devanbu, P., & Sutton, C.

title: These articles provide comprehensive overviews of their respective topics and are a great starting point for anyone looking to understand the current state and future directions of NLP research
